alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Linn; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 4:30PM CDT until July 23 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chariton County in north central Missouri... Southwestern Linn County in north central Missouri... Southeastern Livingston County in north central Missouri... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 430 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Hale, or 10 miles southwest of Brookfield, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mendon, Sumner and Rothville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
